# NETWORK::NETWORK_SET_INVITE_FAILED_MESSAGE_FOR_INVITE_MENU

## Summary
Changes the "Invited" text next to the rank by the gamer name in the player list invite menus

## Parameters
* **GAMER_HANDLE\*** gamerHandle
* **STRING** failedInviteMessage
